title: Skill Test Scenarios
description: Schema for validating scenarios.yaml files in skill test directories

skill_name.description: Skill name using only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens

description.description: Brief description of what these test scenarios validate

copy_to_home.description: Optional list of paths to copy from real HOME to test environment HOME (e.g., .config/gh, .kube/config)

name.description: Test scenario name using only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens

prompt.description: User question to test the skill with

model.description: Claude model to use for this test scenario

samples.description: Number of result samples to generate for this scenario

oneOf.description: Array of keywords (OR condition - at least one must be present)

contains_keywords.description: Keywords or phrases that must be present in the output (arrays represent OR conditions). Can be empty for negative tests.

does_not_contain.description: Keywords or phrases that must NOT be present in the output

expected.description: Expected characteristics of the test output

baseline_failure.description: Description of what failed in the RED phase (baseline test without the skill)
